Witness reports of standard mail procedures with no deviations

Target selection aligns with prior academic/technological bombings
Geographic disparity between mailing origin and target location supports a commuter pattern

supporting_evidence: Methodical planning and technical proficiency in bomb assembly
Controlled, unemotional execution with no chaotic violence
